AS3 – Getting Started¶

Using Postman we will modify BIG-IP by using POST commands to the following URI #. how to highlight this line gray

https://<BIG-IP>/mgmt/shared/appsvcs/declare

Clear Partition¶

   {
   "class": "AS3",
   "action": "deploy",
   "declaration": {
       "class": "ADC",
       "schemaVersion": "3.1.0",
       "new_partition": {
           "class": "Tenant"
       }
   }
}
